text: Atahpara yakhana take prasaba karalo balala, he amara palanakarta! Ami eke kan'ya prasaba karechi. Bastutah ki se prasaba kareche allaha ta bhala'i janena. Se'i kan'yara mata kona putra'i ye ne'i. Ara ami tara nama rakhalama mara'iyama. Ara ami take o tara santanaderake tomara asraye samarpana karachi. Abhisapta sayatanera kabala theke.
